article.title: BAE to Provide Software Engineering Services
article.text: BAE Systems Information Solutions Inc., McLean, Virginia, has been awarded a $16,900,000 modification (P00007) cost-plus-fixed-fee, indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity contract for Systems Engineering and Evaluations, Systems analysis Worldwide 6. Contractor will provide in-scope activities for utilizing the software engineering lifecycle process to implement and integrate a cohesive approach for program requirement development and maintenance. The work includes any or all lifecycle phases, including but not limited to, analytical studies, system feasibility studies, technical support to system design, engineering efforts, system trade-off studies, design efforts for experimental demonstration efforts, software specification efforts, limited software development efforts to maintain existing systems, system simulations, component and systems integration, test and evaluation analysis, prototyping, functional evaluation of installed systems and system analysis. Work will be performed at McLean, Virginia; and Rome, New York, and is expected to be complete by April 3, 2017. The Air Force Research Laboratory, Rome, New York, is the contracting activity (FA8750-12-D-0001).
